title: Where's the Sol?
body: So I'm fully up to date and I'm on patch 6.6 but Aurelion's not in the store. It's possible I'm just being impatient, but it states in the patch notes that he's released this patch.

replies.body: Most likely next week. They have been doing this for the last 3 champs. His champion spotlight isn't even out yet.
Champs are not usually activated when the patch is first released. Often times, the champs will come out several days later. Let's hope it's sooner, because I am just as impatient as you are!
